title: An Act preventing funds deposited in children’s savings accounts from counting against cash assistance benefits

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Tyler of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 288) of Chynah Tyler relative to preventing funds deposited in children’s savings accounts from counting against cash assistance benefits.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 07/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-03:15 PM in A-1                                                                                                     and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Accompanied a study order, see H4883
